message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $85.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $90 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still think $98 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to meet you at $92, but I need to make a profit.
